We want to put the largest digit in the highest place value. 

Which digit is the largest?

$\greenD3$ is the largest digit, and we want to put it in the position with the highest place value.   

  So $\greenD3$ will be in the hundreds place: 
 $\greenD{3}$ $\_$ $\_$

Now we need to do the same thing with the next largest digit:  $\blueD1$.  

  So  $\blueD1$ goes in the tens place:  

$\greenD{3}$$\blueD1$ $\_$

The smallest digit is the $\purpleC0$.  The  $\purpleC0$ goes in the ones place:  

$\greenD{3}\blueD1\purpleC0$

The greatest possible number we can make is $\greenD{3}\blueD1\purpleC0$.
